title: How to Cheat on Windows Pinball With Hidden Test

steps.title: Open Windows 3D Pinball.
steps.content: Open Windows 3D Pinball. Type in hidden test without any quotation marks or capitals. When you drag the mouse, the ball will track your movements. Bonus time! Drag the ball into the hyperspace launch tube where you will get many bonuses.

steps.title: Rack up some points!
steps.content: Rack up some points! Press the “H” on your keyboard and get an instant 1,000,000,000 points for your score. When you do this, the number 1 high score spot doesn't let you post a score in it, but you can post your 1,000,000,000 score in all high score spots except number 1.

steps.title: Type “Incredible” or “Imax” to increase the field multiplier.
steps.content: Type “Incredible” or “Imax” to increase the field multiplier. The 5th time you hit the targets, you field multiplier will jump to 20x. The 6th time, 50x. The 7th time, 100x! The 8th time, it will stay active. This will work until you reach Fleet Level.

steps.title: Try these other commands:
steps.content: Try these other commands: Press "r" or “rmax” to get promoted through the ranks from Cadet to Fleet Admiral. Type “gmax” to activate the gravity well. Type “1max” for an extra ball. Type “bmax” to get unlimited balls. Type “y” to make everything red. Type “m” to show the memory usage of Windows 3D Pinball
